title: El Lado Oscuro
text: El Lado Oscuro (<a href="English%20language">en:</a> "The Dark Side") is the second studio album by <a href="power%20metal">power metal</a> band <a href="DarkSun">DarkSun</a>, released in 2004. The band entered the studios at the end of 2003. Just like "<a href="El%20Legado%20%28DarkSun%20album%29">El Legado</a>", this album was recorded in Germany, with Ingo Cjavkoski in the production. This time the band had Dennis Ward on mixings. (who was better known for his work with <a href="Angra%20%28band%29">Angra</a>), and Lars Ratz (from <a href="Metalium">Metalium</a>) assisted on the vocals production. Once again the reviews were as good as they could possibly be, like "...it's a varied work, where <a href="power%20metal">power</a> and <a href="heavy%20metal%20music">heavy metal</a> alternate and mi", and ""El Lado Oscuro" is a really good power metal album". <a href="Peavy%20Wagner">Peavy Wagner</a> (of <a href="Rage%20%28German%20band%29">Rage</a> fame) performed vocals on a song, which was released as a bonus track on the album, entitled "Prisoners of Fate".
